fields.Name: Kaelin Dross
fields.Motivation: Maintain failing systems out of obligation and memory of a more stable past.
fields.Relationships: Works with Mila Ro; Avoids SensoCore Compliance; Friends with Null Iris

fields.Name: Mila Ro
fields.Motivation: Redirect municipal heat to underserved zones against protocol.
fields.Relationships: Trusted by Kaelin Dross; Secret member of Radian Loop Collective

fields.Name: SensoCore Compliance
fields.Goals: Preserve urban order through neuro-compliance enforcement.
fields.Beliefs / Code: Behavior stability through continuous monitoring. Emotional variance is risk.
fields.Allies / Enemies: Partners with Municipal AI Cluster Theta; Conflicts with Radian Loop Collective

fields.Name: Relay Vaults
fields.Description: Decommissioned server bunkers echoing with half-erased AI logic. Informal shelters for signal scavengers.
fields.Mood: Hollow, low-frequency hum, flickers of light
fields.Significance: Rumored site of suppressed decision logs from the early flood response era.

fields.Name: The Patch Act Collapse
fields.Summary: The regulatory collapse that unraveled jurisdiction boundaries between AI-managed districts.
fields.Who Was Involved: SensoCore Compliance, Radian Loop Collective, citizen forums
fields.Why It Matters: Led to rise of citizen-led control initiatives and blackout of zone 3A.

fields.Name: Memory Splice Key
fields.Description: Black market memory modifier used to rewrite identity packets across platforms.
fields.Powers / Purpose: Embed or erase targeted neural paths in low-shielded users.
fields.Origin / Lore: Traced to early blacksite labs in Vault sector 4; circulated via freelance agents like Null Iris.

fields.Name: Radian Loop Collective
fields.Goals: Empower residents to reroute resources and override system-level neglect.
fields.Beliefs / Code: Decentralization by necessity. Survival through cooperation.
fields.Allies / Enemies: Ally to Mila Ro; opposed by SensoCore for subverting resource pathways
